page.title: 05 HOBBIES.
page.content:
Members of 4B Elengani School attend the following clubs,Guides,Scouts,Chiltern Youth Club (Friday and Saturday night),Amersham Music Centre,Football Clubs,Tai Kuando, Dancing Groups,Model Engineering Club, Sea Cadets,Athletics,Rugby,Judo and Lace-making .
A popular craze at the moment is break dancing:-this is an extremely accrobatic style of dancing.The people who can do this dance are usually about 12 to 18 years old .They dress in brighty coloured clothes and fashion has developed around this.The dance is done to music called electro rock.The moves involve spinning on virious parts of your body,robotics,and using your body as if it were totaly flexable.
